kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
kw.msg: Firefox driver log is always forced to to: D:\RobotDemo\TestCases\results\geckodriver-9.log

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

test.name: VerifyLoginbyUsingCSV using standard_us and secret_sauce then verify error displays: Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service

kw.name: Invalid Login Scenarios
kw.arg: Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Element 'xpath://h3[@data-test="error"]' contains text 'Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service'.
